root.name: Playshake
root.description: IntroductionTecmo's Playshake is a WiiWare game announced at TGS 2008 that will launch for 500 Nintendo Points in Japan according to Famitsu. Playshake is a compilation of different Wii Remote motion control-inspired minigames, testing your speed and endurance. Playshake will have online ranking boards.The mini-gamesOnly one of the mini games is known about at this time (October 24, 2008).Shake the Wii Remote as fast as possible during 3 seconds. The player who managed to shake the Remote the most wins.
